00017 bool BackgroundModel::Initialize() {
00018         if (m_initialized)
00019                 DeInitialize();
00020 
00021         if (!doc->trackermodel.IsInitialized())
00022                 return false;
00023         // initialize a codebook
00024         if (GetSize() == 0)
00025                 SetSize(doc->trackermodel.cx*doc->trackermodel.cy);
00026 
00027         return true;
00028 }
00029 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 void BackgroundModel::DeInitialize() {
00031         if (!m_initialized)
00032                 return;
00033         m_initialized = false;
00034         RemoveAll();
00035 }
00036 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 void BackgroundModel::Update(int nFrame/*=-1*/) {
00038         // accept only unsigned char x 3 images
00039         ASSERT(imgFrame->depth == IPL_DEPTH_8U);
00040         ASSERT(imgFrame->nChannels == 3);
00041 
00042         // check if it is time to update
00043         if (nFrame != -1 && nFrame % m_updateFreq)
00044                 return;
00045 
00046         // if done updating - exit
00047         if (m_mode == STATIC && nFrame != -1 && nFrame >= m_initStage)
00048                 return;
00049 
00050         // remove stale codewords
00051         if (nFrame != -1 && (nFrame % m_removeStaleFreq) == 0)
00052                 RemoveStale();
00053 
00054         // create a mask of non-dormant bodies
00055         cvZero(body_mask);
00056         doc->bodymodel.RasterizeNonDormant(body_mask);
00057 
00058         // update each codeword
00059         Pixel* p = new Pixel();
00060         for (int x=0; x<imgFrame->width; x++)
00061         for (int y=0; y<imgFrame->height; y++)
00062         {
00063                 if (body_mask->imageData[body_mask->widthStep*y+x] == 0) {
00064                         Image::getPixel(imgFrame, p, x, y);
00065                         this->GetAt(y*imgFrame->width+x).UpdateColor(p, nFrame, m_CDmax, m_BDmin, m_BDmax);
00066                         if (doc->trackermodel.m_mode == TRGBFILE) {
00067                                 int val = (UCHAR)(imgThermal->imageData[imgThermal->widthStep*y+x]);
00068                                 this->GetAt(y*imgFrame->width+x).UpdateThermal(val, nFrame, m_ThermalMin, m_ThermalMax);
00069                         }
00070                 }
00071         } 
00072         delete p;
00073 } 
00074 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075 void BackgroundModel::SubtractBackground(IplImage* FGMap, int nFrame) {
00076         // accept only unsigned char x 3 images
00077         ASSERT(imgFrame->depth == IPL_DEPTH_8U);
00078         ASSERT(imgFrame->nChannels == 3);
00079         ASSERT(FGMap->nChannels == 1);
00080         ASSERT(FGMap->depth == IPL_DEPTH_8U);
00081 
00082         // initialize a codebook
00083         if (GetSize() == 0)
00084                 SetSize(Image::getSizeInPixels(imgFrame));
00085 
00086         // start subtraction after m_trackAfterAgePercentage of codewords have reached m_trackAfterAge
00087         if (m_mode == ADAPTIVE) {
00088                 int all = 0;
00089                 int mature = 0;
00090                 for (int i=0; i<Image::getSizeInPixels(imgFrame); i++)
00091                 {
00092                         mature += this->GetAt(i).CountOlderThan(m_trackAfterAge);
00093                         all += (int)this->GetAt(i).color.GetSize();
00094                 }       
00095                 if (1.0*mature/all < 1.0*m_trackAfterAgePercentage/100)
00096                         return;
00097         }
00098         if (m_mode == STATIC) {
00099                 if (nFrame < m_initStage) {
00100                         cvZero(FGMap);
00101                         return;
00102                 }
00103         }
00104 
00105         Pixel* p = new Pixel();
00106         for (int y=0; y<imgFrame->height; y++)
00107         for (int x=0; x<imgFrame->width; x++)
00108         {
00109                 Image::getPixel(imgFrame, p, x, y);
00110                 if (this->GetAt(y*imgFrame->width+x).MatchColor(p, nFrame, m_CDmax, m_BDmin, m_BDmax, m_minAge))
00111                         FGMap->imageData[y*FGMap->widthStep+x] = 0;
00112                 else
00113                         FGMap->imageData[y*FGMap->widthStep+x] = (UCHAR)255;
00114                 
00115                 if (TRGBFILE) {
00116                         int val = (UCHAR)(imgThermal->imageData[imgThermal->widthStep*y+x]);
00117                         if (this->GetAt(y*imgFrame->width+x).MatchThermalByDeviation(val, nFrame, m_ThermalMin, m_ThermalMax, m_minAge))
00118                                 FGMap->imageData[y*FGMap->widthStep+x] = 0;
00119                 }
00120 
00121         } 
00122         delete p;
00123 
00124         // -------------- Morphologically post-process the image -------------------------
00125         //cvMorphologyEx(FGMap, dilated, NULL, NULL, CV_MOP_OPEN);
00126         if (m_Erode) {
00127                 IplConvKernel* elem = cvCreateStructuringElementEx( m_ErodeSize, m_ErodeSize, 0, 0, CV_SHAPE_RECT);
00128                 cvErode(FGMap, FGMap, elem); 
00129                 cvReleaseStructuringElement(&elem);
00130         }
00131         if (m_Dilate) {
00132                 IplConvKernel* elem = cvCreateStructuringElementEx( m_DilateSize, m_DilateSize, 0, 0, CV_SHAPE_RECT);
00133                 cvDilate(FGMap, FGMap, elem);
00134                 cvReleaseStructuringElement(&elem);
00135         }
00136 }

00138 void BackgroundModel::SubtractBackgroundProbabilistic(IplImage* FGMapDouble, int nFrame) {
00139         // accept only unsigned char x 3 images
00140         ASSERT(imgFrame->depth == IPL_DEPTH_8U);
00141         ASSERT(imgFrame->nChannels == 3);
00142         ASSERT(FGMapDouble->nChannels == 1);
00143         ASSERT(FGMapDouble->depth == IPL_DEPTH_32F);
00144         
00145         // start subtraction after m_trackAfterAgePercentage of codewords have reached m_trackAfterAge
00146         if (m_mode == ADAPTIVE) {
00147                 int all = 0;
00148                 int mature = 0;
00149                 for (int i=0; i<Image::getSizeInPixels(imgFrame); i++)
00150                 {
00151                         mature += this->GetAt(i).CountOlderThan(m_trackAfterAge);
00152                         all += (int)this->GetAt(i).color.GetSize();
00153                 }       
00154                 if (1.0*mature/all < 1.0*m_trackAfterAgePercentage/100)
00155                         return;
00156         }
00157         if (m_mode == STATIC) {
00158                 if (nFrame < m_initStage) {
00159                         cvZero(FGMapDouble);
00160                         return;
00161                 }
00162         }
00163         
00164         Pixel* p = new Pixel();
00165         for (int y=0; y<imgFrame->height; y++)
00166         for (int x=0; x<imgFrame->width; x++)
00167         {
00168                 Image::getPixel(imgFrame, p, x, y);
00169                 ((float*)(FGMapDouble->imageData + FGMapDouble->widthStep*y))[x] = (float)this->GetAt(y*imgFrame->width+x).MatchColorProbabilistic(p, nFrame, m_CDmax, m_BDmin, m_BDmax, m_minAge);
00170         } 
00171         delete p;
00172 }
00173 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00174 void BackgroundModel::GetSizes(IplImage* result) {
00175         int max_size = 0;
00176         for (int i=0;i<GetSize();i++) {
00177                 result->imageData[i] = (char)this->GetAt(i).color.GetSize();
00178                 if (result->imageData[i] > max_size)
00179                         max_size = result->imageData[i];
00180         } 
00181         cvScale(result, result, 255/max_size);
00182 }
00183 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00184 void BackgroundModel::RemoveStale() {
00185         for (int i=0;i<GetSize();i++) {
00186                 this->GetAt(i).RemoveStale((int)(m_staleCutoff));
00187         } 
00188 }
00189 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00190 void BackgroundModel::Draw(IplImage* frame) {
00191         // update each codeword
00192         Pixel* p = new Pixel();
00193         for (int y=0; y<frame->height; y++)
00194         for (int x=0; x<frame->width; x++)
00195         {
00196                 this->GetAt(y*frame->width+x).GetRGB(p);
00197                 Image::setPixel(frame, p, x, y);
00198         } 
00199         delete p;
00200 }

00202 void BackgroundModel::Serialize( CArchive& ar ) {
00203         CArray<CodeBook>::Serialize( ar );
00204         if( ar.IsStoring()) {
00205                 ar  << m_mode
00206                         << m_CDmax << m_BDmin << m_BDmax << m_initStage 
00207                         << m_Erode << m_ErodeSize << m_Dilate << m_DilateSize 
00208                         << m_staleCutoff << m_removeStaleFreq << m_trackAfterAge << m_trackAfterAgePercentage << m_minAge << m_updateFreq;
00209         }
00210         else {
00211                 ar  >> m_mode
00212                         >> m_CDmax >> m_BDmin >> m_BDmax >> m_initStage
00213                         >> m_Erode >> m_ErodeSize >> m_Dilate >> m_DilateSize 
00214                         >> m_staleCutoff >> m_removeStaleFreq >> m_trackAfterAge >> m_trackAfterAgePercentage >> m_minAge >> m_updateFreq;
00215         }
00216 }
00217 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00218 int BackgroundModel::GetModelSizeInCodewords() {
00219         int size = 0;
00220         for (int i=0;i<GetSize();i++)
00221                 size += this->GetAt(i).color.GetSize();
00222         return size;
00223 }
